function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to infected surfaces due to high-traffic areas and shared spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection for individuals who come into contact with infected surfaces.","Mitigation":"Implementation of touchless technologies and self-cleaning spaces to reduce contact with potentially infected surfaces.","Technologies":"Motion sensors, keycard swiping, pressure sensors, self-cleaning surfaces, UV-C disinfection technology.","People":"Residents, building occupants, cleaning staff, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, technology providers, cleaning companies."}]}
